content.rendered:
Teeth Whitening

Teeth Whitening Gardena, CA

If you have ever wished that your smile was whiter and brighter, teeth whitening might be right for you. If you are keeping up with regular cleanings, but still feel like your smile could be more stunning, our dentists may recommend professional teeth whitening. Professional teeth whitening can easily remove years of stains and is a popular choice for patients of all ages.

What Are the Different Types of Teeth Whitening?

At Gardena Dental Group, we offer both in-office and take-home teeth whitening options. Both of our professional teeth whitening treatments utilize a powerful and safe whitening gel that is applied to the surface of your teeth. This gel works to lighten the appearance of stains, discoloration, and yellowing on the tooth enamel. Our dentist will work with you to determine the right type and length of treatment to achieve the smile aesthetic you desire.

What is Teeth Whitening?

Teeth whitening is a simple, effective cosmetic dental treatment that we offer to noticeably enhance your smile in as little as one treatment. Professional teeth whitening can lighten staining and discoloration caused by various factors, such as:

  • The natural aging process
  • Poor dental hygiene habits
  • Consumption of certain drinks and foods, including tea, wine, coffee, and soda
  • Smoking and other forms of tobacco use
  • Illness
  • Certain medications
  • Fluorosis
Book Your Appointment Now
